# FFTRadix

**Type Alias**

The radix of the FFT decomposition.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias FFTRadix = Int32
```

## Discussion

Pass an `FFTRadix` value as an argument to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/kernel/1580009-vdsp_create_fftsetup] or [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_create_fftsetupD].

## FFT Setup

- **FFTSetup**: An opaque type that contains setup information for a single-precision FFT transform.
- **FFTSetupD**: An opaque type that contains setup information for a double-precision FFT transform.
